Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.31.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.31.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package telegraf is earlier than 1.31.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-28180
